W) Green X) Yellow Y) Half of the offspring will have green seeds and half will have yellow seeds Z) A seed color that is halfway between green and yellow
answer:
Y) HALF OF THE OFFSPRING WILL HAVE GREEN SEEDS AND HALF WILL HAVE
YELLOW SEEDS
